name: Unti
description:
Controls:

   WASD/Arrow Keys = Movement

   X to change forms

   Z to Push (in bear form)

   Space to Fire (in bee form)

Story:

     You're a shapeshifting robot that crashed into an abandoned factory.  Escape it to WIN!

How to run:

     Extract and run the Fuzzy Socks Game Jam application

Credits:
